name: Fré Dumazy
description:
Hi, my name is Fré. I'm a software engineer with a focus on anything app related. After starting my career as an Android developer, I quickly moved into other technologies for mobile, web and back-end. I'm passionate about code quality and I love to share my knowledge with others.

I love being involved into a project from start to finish and empower teams to deliver high quality software. I'm currenlty working as a self-employed Flutter engineer and educator.
